mapper.select: SELECT f.IF_ID AS ifId, f.IF_FLOW_ID AS ifFlowId, f.IF_INDENT_ID AS ifIndentId, f.IF_STATE AS ifState FROM INDENT_FLOW f WHERE f.IF_INDENT_ID=${id}

SELECT f.IF_ID AS ifId, f.IF_FLOW_ID AS ifFlowId, f.IF_INDENT_ID AS ifIndentId, f.IF_STATE AS ifState,
fd.FD_ID AS fdId, fd.FD_FLOW_ID AS fdFlowId, DATE_FORMAT(fd.FD_STARTTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS fdStartTime, fd.FD_TASK_ID AS fdTaskId
FROM INDENT_FLOW f LEFT JOIN FLOW_DATE fd ON f.IF_FLOW_ID=fd.FD_FLOW_ID HAVING f.IF_INDENT_ID =${id} AND f.IF_STATE ='Y'
SELECT f.IF_ID AS ifId, f.IF_FLOW_ID AS ifFlowId, f.IF_INDENT_ID AS ifIndentId, f.IF_STATE AS ifState FROM INDENT_FLOW f WHERE f.IF_ID=${flowid}
SELECT f.IF_ID AS ifId, f.IF_FLOW_ID AS ifFlowId, f.IF_INDENT_ID AS ifIndentId, f.IF_STATE AS ifState FROM INDENT_FLOW f WHERE f.IF_FLOW_ID=#{processId}
SELECT f.IF_ID AS ifId, f.IF_FLOW_ID AS ifFlowId, f.IF_INDENT_ID AS ifIndentId, f.IF_STATE AS ifState FROM INDENT_FLOW f WHERE f.IF_INDENT_ID =${id} AND f.IF_STATE ='Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM INDENT_FLOW WHERE IF_INDENT_ID =${id} AND IF_FLOW_ID =${ifFlowId}
